headline: Agoda's 'Hat Yai Lights Up' Campaign Invites Travelers to Experience the City Like Never Before
summary: Digital travel platform Agoda is bringing the spotlight to one of Southern Thailand's most dynamic destinations with the launch of its new 'Hat Yai Lights Up' campaign, celebrating the area's recovery and return to business after last year's flooding. In partnership with Hat Yai Songkhla Hotels Association, the campaign invites travelers to explore the city like never before with great deals and seamless planning.
